text: Uyezve (vakaregerera) vatatu vasina kubatana nevamwe (pahondo yeku Tabook) kusvika nyika nemakuriro ayo yakava diki uye vakava vanobatikana pachavo, uye vakava nechokwadi kuti hakuna kutiza kuna Allah, uye kwekuhwanda asi kwavari (Allah). Nokudaro vakavaregerera kuti vave vanokumbira (rushanduko kwavari). Zvirokwazvo, Allah ndivo vega vanoregerera, uye kugamuchira rushanduko, vane tsitsi dzakanyanya
